n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
t=table(arr)
c=which(t>1)
l=length(c)
dist=array(0)
for(i in 1:l){
  dist[i]=max(which(arr==c[[i]]))-min(which(arr==c[[i]]))
}
print(max(dist))
